channel.title: CVE Feed for subratamal -- TeraWallet – For WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for subratamal -- TeraWallet – For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-3995|2024-08-03T01:27:53.862Z -- subratamal -- terawallet%20%E2%80%93%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The TeraWallet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in versions up to, and including, 1.4.3. This is due to insufficient validation of the user-controlled key on the lock_unlock_terawallet AJAX action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to lock/unlock other users wallets.
